title: Inside Lydia Bright and Lucy Mecklenburgh's joint babymoon

Pregnant former Towie girls Lydia Bright and Lucy Mecklenburgh are ultimate bestfriend goals.

After the pair announced their pregnancies at around the same time, they've spent a lot of time together enjoying the last of the precious moments.

They're currently enjoying a Greek break with a group of their gal pals as giving birth gets closer.

Love Island star Montana Brown has joined them along with presenter Ashley Louise James.

It seems that Lucy and Lyd are there courtesy of work on their luxury mini break, as Lydia, 29, uploaded a snap which said "press trip".

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

They are staying at the Grecotel Corfu Imperial resort, which is described as "exclusive" on the website.

The girls went to a wine tasting session, and luckily for Lucy and Lydia they didn't have to miss out. Instead they had non-alcoholic wine.

Lucy, 28, shared a snap on Instagram which said: "We can get involved in wine tasting," with a smiley emoji.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

On the nights, the girls have enjoyed a trip across the sea on a boat, followed by luxury meals which Lydia described as a "feast".

But just because they're pregnant doesn't mean they've not got up to any mischief.

They filmed themselves driving together in a golf caddy on an evening, and have shared videos fooling around.

(Image: Instagram)

Lydia and Lucy have shared endless bump pics as they stand side by side.

One photo showed the girls cradling their bumps and the caption read: "Taking our babies on a yacht day."

It seems the babies are living a life of luxury already.

It's unknown as to what exact dates the mums-to-be are due.

But Lucy announced on Instagram that she was over three months in August, so her baby is likely to be due in February 2020.

(Image: Instagram)

Lydia's baby should be due around the same time, as they are carrying together.

Brunette beauty Lucy is expecting her first son with fiance and former Coronation Street star Ryan Thomas .

While Lydia is expecting her daughter with ex boyfriend Lee Cronin.
description: The pregnant pair are making the most of their last months together before giving birth in the new year
